person.persName: Bayliss M. Stone (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha P. Kevil in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in November 1853. Father to William Stone. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1863.
